p: The same colon removed, washed, and dried was photographed using a Canon camera (Cyber-shot, 7.2 megapixels, China); then, the samples from this colon were fixed in 10% formalin buffered with PBS. The sections were made in pieces of 5 μm each; then, staining was done with hematoxylin-eosin (H&E) [ 29].
